message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
How about a slight adjustment?  550,000 for me, and 450,000 for you. It's still a great deal!
I'll meet you halfway between my first offer and your last one. 58-42 is the new deal!
Time is running out, Alice! Let's compromise. I'll take a little less, you take a little more. 520,000 for me, 480,000 for you.
I'll take a bit less than before. 56-44, and we're done!
Alice, let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is the fairest and ensures we both walk away with a significant sum.  Every round that passes hurts you more than it hurts me. Let's be smart about this.
